unnormalised: Hey folks, return policies are super important, no? Just last Diwali, I bought a kurta from a shop in Delhi, but the size was off! Thankfully, their return policy was smooth like butter chicken. Many places have complicated rules, like my cousin Ravi faced after buying a phone near Chennai. Hope more retailers have customer-friendly policies, especially around Onam!
